item.title: 英伟达超越苹果，710 亿美元 ETF 大洗牌在即
item.description: 世界上最著名的科技 ETF 之一似乎准备进行一次大的调整，这将增加对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的投资，而牺牲苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：One of the world’s most prominent technology ETFs looks poised for a big rebalancing that would ramp up exposure to Nvidia Corp. at the expense of Apple Inc. – spurring billions of dollars in trading volume in one fell swoop.】

item.title: Trafigura 向美国商品期货交易委员会支付 5500 万美元，就操纵案达成和解
item.description: 全球最大的大宗商品交易商之一 Trafigura 集团被美国指控操纵燃油基准并阻止员工与监管机构合作，该公司同意支付 5500 万美元。【原文：Trafigura Group, one of the world’s largest commodity traders, agreed to pay $55 million over US allegations that it manipulated a fuel oil benchmark and blocked employees from cooperating with regulators.】

item.title: 丰业银行称市场对国民银行与西雅图银行的交易过于消极
item.description: 加拿大国家银行宣布有意收购加拿大西部银行后，其股价受到了过于严厉的惩罚，新斯科舍银行称该交易为 "战略赢家"。【原文：National Bank of Canada shares are being punished too harshly after announcing its intent to buy Canadian Western Bank, according to Bank of Nova Scotia, which called the deal a “strategic winner.”】

item.title: 能源类股票发行稀少，卡尔加里银行家面临风险
item.description: 加拿大股票市场的股票发行正在反弹，但石油和天然气公司除外，这些公司的股票发行已经枯竭，以至于投资银行正在缩减在卡尔加里的活动。【原文：Stock offerings are rebounding across Canada’s equity market, except for oil and gas companies, where issuance has dried up to the point that investment banks are scaling back their activities in Calgary.】

item.title: 被指与欧佩克勾结的前先锋公司首席执行官与华盛顿游说公司合作
item.description: 在美国联邦贸易委员会称先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.）前总裁斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）试图与石油输出国组织（OPEC）勾结后，他聘请了一家实力雄厚的华盛顿游说公司。【原文：Scott Sheffield, the former head of Pioneer Natural Resources Co., has hired a powerful Washington, DC lobbying firm after the US Federal Trade Commission said he tried to collude with OPEC.】

item.title: EchoStar's Hughes 的债权人聘请律师调查租赁交易
item.description: 休斯卫星系统公司（Hughes Satellite Systems Corp.）的一些债权人聘请律师事务所 Glenn Agre Bergman & Fuentes 审查一项昂贵的租赁安排，据熟悉情况的人士称，他们认为该安排将现金从休斯卫星系统公司转移到其母公司 EchoStar。【原文：Some creditors to Hughes Satellite Systems Corp. engaged law firm Glenn Agre Bergman & Fuentes to scrutinize a costly lease arrangement that they say funnels cash away from the unit to its parent EchoStar, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 具有 100% 胜率信号的交易指标 立即卖出多头债券
item.description: 今年交易记录完美的一种技术交易策略发出信号，在上周反弹之后，是时候卖出长期国债了。【原文：A technical trading strategy with a perfect trading record this year is signaling that it’s time to sell long-maturity Treasuries after a rally last week.】

item.title: Antares 将为第三期优先贷款基金筹资约 60 亿美元
item.description: 尽管私人信贷融资趋冷，Antares Capital 仍希望为其第三支优先贷款基金筹集多达 60 亿美元的资金。【原文：Antares Capital is looking to raise as much as $6 billion for its third senior loan fund despite a cooldown in private credit fundraising.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称阿根廷将把实际利率提高到正值水平
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周一表示，阿根廷将把实际利率调至正值，并放宽货币管制，因为这个危机频发的国家正寻求继续放缓物价上涨，并保护其外汇储备。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said Monday that Argentina will move real interest rates into positive territory and ease currency controls as the crisis-prone nation seeks to continue a slowdown in price increases and protect its foreign exchange reserves.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官面临参议院质询，继任者寻找步伐加快
item.description: 波音公司一架 737 Max 9 型飞机发生近乎灾难性的事故，危机笼罩着波音公司，首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）近几个月来越来越低调。【原文：As crisis engulfs Boeing Co. following the near-catastrophic accident on an airborne 737 Max 9 aircraft, Chief Executive Officer Dave Calhoun has kept an increasingly low profile in recent months.】

item.title: 棕榈滩寻求 9500 万美元债券阻止垃圾工外流
item.description: 佛罗里达州的棕榈滩（Palm Beach）以其宫殿式的海滨庄园吸引了世界上最富有、最有权势的人，这里是总统候选人、对冲基金巨头和房地产大亨的居所。【原文：Florida’s Palm Beach has lured some of the world’s wealthiest and most powerful people with its palatial, oceanfront estates home to presidential hopefuls, hedge-fund titans and real-estate tycoons.】

item.title: 旅游资源丰富的岛屿放弃将国内生产总值作为赢得援助的衡量标准
item.description: 一群富裕的加勒比国家正试图撼动全球金融，从而减少对中国的依赖，增加获得资金的机会。【原文：A group of wealthy Caribbean nations is trying to shake up global finance in a way that would cut dependence on China and boost their access to funding.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师看涨股市，对冲基金却对股市持谨慎态度
item.description: 华尔街的策略师们正急于上调 S&P 500 指数的目标，但由于美联储不愿降息、经济数据疲软以及股市宽度收窄，对冲基金对股市的态度越来越谨慎。【原文：Wall Street strategists are rushing to raise their targets for the S&P 500 Index, but hedge funds are growing increasingly cautious about equities due to the Federal Reserve’s reluctance to cut interest rates, softer economic data and narrow stock market breadth.】

item.title: 美国公司利用债券市场，国债收益率延续反弹势头
item.description: 由于新公司债券的大量发行，以及预计在假期缩短的一周内将进行两次拍卖，国债收益率回吐了上周的部分急剧跌幅。【原文：Treasury yields retraced a portion of last week’s steep declines amid a deluge of new corporate bonds and anticipation of two auctions during a holiday-shortened week.】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的安哥拉银行面临洗钱高风险
item.description: 安哥拉正努力避免被列入全球非法金融观察名单，它说，这个产油国的银行业存在洗钱的 "高风险"。【原文：Angola, which is trying to avoid being added to a global illicit-finance watchlist, said there’s a “high risk” of money laundering in the oil-producing nation’s banking industry.】

item.title: 秘鲁矿商沃尔坎希望进一步出售 2 亿美元资产
item.description: 最近被阿根廷集团Integra Capital收购的秘鲁锌矿商Volcan Cia Minera表示，该公司正在推进出售非核心资产的计划，同时正在与债权人谈判，为未来几年即将到期的一大堆债务进行再融资。【原文：Volcan Cia Minera, the Peruvian zinc miner that was recently acquired by Argentine group Integra Capital, said it is pushing ahead with plans to sell non-core assets as it talks with creditors to refinance a pile of debt coming due in the coming years.】

item.title: 私募股权公司不会停止用债务支付投资者的步伐
item.description: 私募股权投资者要求获得回报的呼声很高。为满足他们的要求，一种冒险的方法创下了记录，而且越来越受欢迎。【原文：Private equity investors are clamoring for their payouts. A risky approach to meeting their demands is setting records — and getting more popular.】

item.title: 旧债券市场策略的新变化吸引数十亿资金投入加密货币项目
item.description: 去中心化金融领域最热门的项目之一，通过将长期以来的债券市场手法与今年最流行的加密货币营销策略相结合，吸引了数十亿美元的资金。【原文：One of the hottest projects in decentralized finance is attracting billions of dollars by combining a long-time bond market maneuver with one of this year’s most popular crypto marketing strategies.】

item.title: 高盛集团的罗斯纳认为固定收益大跌后将出现买入机会
item.description:
"完美定价 "主题将重点放在各类资产的估值上

。【原文：

‘Priced-for-perfection’ theme is putting focus on valuations across asset classes

】

item.title: 数字资产产品上周流出量创三月以来之最
item.description: 来自 CoinShares International Ltd. 的数据显示，由于美联储比预期更加鹰派，促使投资者缩减风险敞口，数字资产投资产品上周流出了 6 亿美元，为 3 月份以来最多。【原文：Digital assets investment products saw $600 million in outflows last week, the most since March, with a more hawkish than expected Federal Reserve prompting investors to scale back risk exposure, data from CoinShares International Ltd. show.】

item.title: 债务上限的最终回归已让基金经理们惶惶不安
item.description: 投资者已经开始计划改变投资组合，以迎接下一次美国债务上限摊牌—；尽管这还有六个多月的时间。【原文：Investors are already planning portfolio changes in anticipation of the next US debt-ceiling showdown — even if it’s still more than six months away.】

item.title: 其他基金管理公司纷纷抛售债务，而 KKR 却在高风险的 CCC 贷款上大做文章
item.description: KKR & Co.公司认为，信用投资者 "过于关注利差"，而错过了信用评级范围内的便宜货，在那里他们可以找到更好的相对价值。【原文：Credit investors are “focusing too much on spreads” and are missing out on bargains further down the credit rating spectrum where they can find better relative value, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 迈克尔-珀尔维斯和乔希-席尔瓦解读分散交易
item.description:
及其对股市的影响。【原文：

And its impact on the stock market.

】

item.title: DSV 与 Neom 的 100 亿美元并购案因未获批准而推迟
item.description: 丹麦货运公司 DSV A/S 与沙特阿拉伯沙漠项目 Neom 之间价值 100 亿美元的合资企业因缺少监管审批而被推迟。【原文：The $10 billion joint venture between Denmark’s freight company DSV A/S and Saudi Arabia’s desert project Neom has been delayed due to missing regulatory approvals.】

item.title: 加拿大新屋开工创七个月来最高水平
item.description: 由于加拿大最大的两个省份加大了公寓、联排别墅和共有公寓的建设力度，加拿大的住房开工率跃升至七个月以来的最高水平。【原文：Canada’s housing starts jumped to the highest level in seven months, as the country’s two largest provinces ramped up construction on apartments, townhouses and condominiums.】

item.title: 美银美林的米德为 2024 年蓝筹债券狂潮放缓做好准备
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的丹-米德（Dan Mead）预计，美国蓝筹股债券市场的活动将在今年年底前放缓，此前借款人在上半年大举举债，因为他们现在受到诱人收益率的诱惑，而以后则要避免大选波动。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s Dan Mead expects US blue-chip bond market activity to slow down through the end of this year, after borrowers gorged on debt in the first half, enticed by attractive yields now and avoiding election volatility later.】

item.title: 即使西班牙阻挠，BBVA 主席仍认为萨瓦德尔交易有价值
item.description: 毕尔巴鄂比斯开亚银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）董事长卡洛斯-托雷斯（Carlos Torres）展开魅力攻势，以赢得对其收购竞争对手萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）计划的最大批评者的支持。【原文：Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA Chairman Carlos Torres embarked on a charm offensive to win over the biggest critic of his plan to buy rival Banco Sabadell SA.】

item.title: 纳图吉公司主要股东探讨所有权替代方案
item.description: 据投资者 Criteria Caixa SA 的官员称，在与阿布扎比国家能源公司（Abu Dhabi National Energy Co.【原文：Naturgy Energy Group SA’s biggest shareholder will explore new alternatives for ownership of the Spanish utility after talks with Abu Dhabi National Energy Co. to acquire the company collapsed, according to officials at investor Criteria Caixa SA.】

item.title: 欧洲央行副行长表示 "个人 "对极右翼势力抬头感到担忧
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，他对极右翼势力在整个地区的崛起感到担忧。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said he’s concerned about the rise of the far-right across the region.】

item.title: 达赖喇嘛说他尚未考虑转世问题
item.description: 达赖喇嘛周一表示，他还没有考虑自己的转世问题，这为谁将接替这位八旬高僧增添了更多不确定性，因为中国正在推动对西藏未来及其领导权的控制。【原文：The Dalai Lama isn’t thinking about his reincarnation yet, he said on Monday, adding more uncertainty over who will succeed the octogenarian monk as China pushes for sway over the future of Tibet and its leadership.】
